page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW of the area.
page.content:
This block covers the following areas of north London: {Residential:} Hampstead Garden Suburb Temple Fortune Golders Green Childs Hill Hampstead Village (part of) Highgate (small part of) {Open Land:} Hampstead Heath and Heath Extension Parliament Hill
About{half}the block is{residential and{half}is not built on. There is lot of{woodland and grassland}which is open to the public. The housing around Hampstead Heath and Parliament Hill is very expensive. There are no tower blocks in the area. The main {shopping area}is in{Golders Green } where there is an{Underground Station.
